synopsis.p: reads files in the format of the I2B2 challenge.

description.p: reads documents in I2B2 challenge including the text of documents, tokenization as annotations, concepts as annotations, assertions as annotation features and relations as tuples.

param-doc.name: conceptsLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to store concepts annotations.

param-doc.name: tokenNumberFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the token index.

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as context element. If the result is false, then the module does not process the module.

param-doc.name: linesLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to store lines.

param-doc.name: textDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory containing I2B2 text files.

param-doc.name: constantAnnotationFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each annotation created by this module

param-doc.name: leftRole
param-doc.p: Name of the left argument of relations.

param-doc.name: tokensLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to store tokens.

param-doc.name: constantDocumentFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each document created by this module

param-doc.name: conceptsDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory that contains concept annotations.

param-doc.name: linenoFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to store the line number.

param-doc.name: constantRelationFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each relation created by this module

param-doc.name: assertionsDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory where assertion files can be found.

param-doc.name: relationsDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory where relation files can be found.

param-doc.name: conceptTypeFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the concept type.

param-doc.name: constantSectionFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each section created by this module

param-doc.name: sectionName
param-doc.p: Name of the unique section of each document.

param-doc.name: constantTupleFeatures
param-doc.p: Constant features to add to each tuple created by this module

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
